Installation¶

Sodium can be installed through composer,

command line¶

1
$ composer require lokesh/sodium

composer.json¶

1
2
3
"require":{
 "lokesh/sodium":"dev-master"
}

1
2
3
4
5
use \Sodium\Sodium;

$sodium = new \Sodium\Sodium('#2f8cab');
echo $sodium->getHex();
echo $sodium->getName();
